main.bio: An engineer with specialisation in web development, knowledge of ReactJs, NextJs, Javascript, HTML, CSS. I am looking forward to leadership opportunities as well as managing the different technologies for your reputed organization.

work.title: Senior Front-End Engineer
description: - Worked with advance web development technologies like React, NextJs, React Hooks, Redux-Toolkit, Sass etc.
- Develop responsive web UI using chakra-ui
- Implemented unit testing using React Testing Library to ensure code quality and prevent regression bugs from entering production environments.
- Used Github as CI/CD Tools.
- Used Jira tool for requirement gathering, GitHub as version control systems.
- Followed Agile methodology throughout development work through requirement gathering, design, Development, Testing, Deployment, Review.

work.title: Software Engineer 2
description: - Building new features using advance web development technologies like React, React-Hooks, Redux-Toolkit, React-Router. ES6, CSS3 Etc.
- Develop responsive web UI design using material-UI, Bootstrap and Tailwind.
- Maintained internal applications including bug fixes and enhancements.
- Used Jenkins as CI/CD Tools and GitHub as version control systems.

- Followed Agile methodology throughout development work through requirement gathering, design, Development, Testing, Deployment, Review.
